resources.string: Tap a phrase to hear it, tap again to stop.\nMake sure your volume is turned up.
Is this app useful for you?\nLet us know how it can be improved.
Write your script, record your phrase,\nand use your flashcard in the field.
An effective flashcard phrase is short, direct, and really clear. Your phrase should make it really easy for the listener to know how to respond.
When you\'re ready, press record. Speak clearly at a normal speed. When you\'re all done, press stop. You can listen back and record again until you\'re happy to save.
Find your new flashcard at the top of the list in the %s category. To make changes to the phrase or delete it, just tap the pencil icon on the flashcard.
Are you sure you want to import %d cards?
